verses.verse: וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> fell יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> face אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> upon his father's וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> over וַיִּשַּׁק־ <S%H5401><s%> upon him and kissed לֽוֹ׃

וַיְצַ֨ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> his servants אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרֹ֣פְאִ֔ים <S%H7495><s%> the physicians לַחֲנֹ֖ט <S%H2590><s%> to embalm אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיַּחַנְט֥וּ <S%H2590><s%> embalmed הָרֹפְאִ֖ים <S%H7495><s%> and the physicians אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיִּמְלְאוּ־ <S%H4390><s%> were fulfilled לוֹ֙ אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> And forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> such יִמְלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> for him for so are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days הַחֲנֻטִ֑ים <S%H2590><s%> of those which are embalmed וַיִּבְכּ֥וּ <S%H1058><s%> mourned אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> for him threescore and ten יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיַּֽעַבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> were past יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And when the days בְכִית֔וֹ <S%H1068><s%> of his mourning וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> now מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> If now I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> in your eyes דַּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> speak נָ֕א <S%H4994><s%> please בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> I pray you in the ears פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אָבִ֞י <S%H1><s%> My father הִשְׁבִּיעַ֣נִי <S%H7650><s%> made me swear לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Lo אָנֹכִי֮ <S%H595><s%> I מֵת֒ <S%H4191><s%> I die בְּקִבְרִ֗י <S%H6913><s%> in my grave אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרִ֤יתִי <S%H3738><s%> which I have digged לִי֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for me in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there תִּקְבְּרֵ֑נִי <S%H6912><s%> there shalt thou bury me וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֶֽעֱלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> Now therefore let me go up נָּ֛א <S%H4994><s%> please וְאֶקְבְּרָ֥ה <S%H6912><s%> I pray thee and bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father וְאָשֽׁוּבָה׃ <S%H7725><s%> and I will come again

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh עֲלֵ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up וּקְבֹ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> and bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he הִשְׁבִּיעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7650><s%> according as he made thee swear

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph לִקְבֹּ֣ר <S%H6912><s%> to bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיַּֽעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> and with him went up אִתּ֜וֹ <S%H854><s%> up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> all the servants פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> the elders בֵית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> and all the elders אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> And all the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> and his father's רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> but טַפָּם֙ <S%H2945><s%> only their little ones וְצֹאנָ֣ם <S%H6629><s%> and their flocks וּבְקָרָ֔ם <S%H1241><s%> and their herds עָזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> they left בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> And there went up עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both רֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> with him both chariots גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> company כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> great מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> and it was a very

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גֹּ֣רֶן <S%H1637><s%> to the threshingfloor הָאָטָ֗ד <S%H329><s%> of Atad אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> which [is] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וַיִּ֨סְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> and there they mourned שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִסְפֵּ֛ד <S%H4553><s%> lamentation גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a great וְכָבֵ֖ד <S%H3515><s%> sore מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and very וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he made לְאָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> for his father אֵ֖בֶל <S%H60><s%> a mourning שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיַּ֡רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יוֹשֵׁב֩ <S%H3427><s%> And when the inhabitants הָאָ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֜י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵ֗בֶל <S%H60><s%> the mourning בְּגֹ֙רֶן֙ <S%H1637><s%> in the floor הָֽאָטָ֔ד <S%H329><s%> of Atad וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> they said אֵֽבֶל־ <S%H60><s%> mourning כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> This [is] a grievous זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> was called שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> wherefore the name of it אָבֵ֣ל מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H67><s%> Abelmizraim אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> which [is] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan
וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> did בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> And his sons ל֑וֹ כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he צִוָּֽם׃ <S%H6680><s%> unto him according as he commanded

וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> carried אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> For his sons אַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> him into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <S%H6912><s%> and buried אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> בִּמְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> him in the cave שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֑ה <S%H4375><s%> of Machpelah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which קָנָה֩ <S%H7069><s%> bought אַבְרָהָ֨ם <S%H85><s%> which Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <S%H7704><s%> with the field לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <S%H272><s%> for a possession קֶ֗בֶר <S%H6913><s%> of a buryingplace מֵאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> עֶפְרֹ֥ן <S%H6085><s%> of Ephron הַחִתִּ֖י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מַמְרֵֽא׃ <S%H4471><s%> Mamre

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> he and his brethren וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> and all that went up אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> he לִקְבֹּ֣ר <S%H6912><s%> with him to bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after קָבְר֥וֹ <S%H6913><s%> grave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw אֲחֵֽי־ <S%H251><s%> brethren יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And when Joseph's כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> that their father וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> they said ל֥וּ <S%H3863><s%> will peradventure יִשְׂטְמֵ֖נוּ <S%H7852><s%> hate us יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וְהָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> and will certainly יָשִׁיב֙ <S%H7725><s%> requite לָ֔נוּ אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> us all the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which גָּמַ֖לְנוּ <S%H1580><s%> which we did אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְצַוּ֕וּ <S%H6680><s%> And they sent a messenger אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אָבִ֣יךָ <S%H1><s%> Thy father צִוָּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> did command לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מוֹת֖וֹ <S%H4194><s%> he died לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> So shall ye say לְיוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph אָ֣נָּ֡א <S%H577><s%> I pray thee שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> Forgive נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> Please פֶּ֣שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> now the trespass אַחֶ֤יךָ <S%H251><s%> of thy brethren וְחַטָּאתָם֙ <S%H2403><s%> and their sin כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> thee רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> unto thee evil גְמָל֔וּךָ <S%H1580><s%> for they did וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> henceforth שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and now we pray thee forgive נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> please לְפֶ֥שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> the trespass עַבְדֵ֖י <S%H5650><s%> of the servants אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> wept יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph בְּדַבְּרָ֥ם <S%H1696><s%> when they spake אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֵּלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> came גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> And his brethren וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> and fell down לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before his face וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and they said הִנֶּ֥נּֽוּ <S%H2009><s%> Behold לְךָ֖ לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> Behold we [be] thy servants

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> But יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> unto them Fear כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for הֲתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God's אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

וְאַתֶּ֕ם <S%H859><s%> you חֲשַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H2803><s%> But as for you ye thought עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> against רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> evil אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> against me [but] God חֲשָׁבָ֣הּ <S%H2803><s%> meant it לְטֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> unto good לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> to עֲשֹׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> bring to pass כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְהַחֲיֹ֥ת <S%H2421><s%> alive עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> much

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> So אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּירָ֔אוּ <S%H3372><s%> Now therefore fear אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I אֲכַלְכֵּ֥ל <S%H3557><s%> ye not I will nourish אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> טַפְּכֶ֑ם <S%H2945><s%> you and your little ones וַיְנַחֵ֣ם <S%H5162><s%> And he comforted אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וַיְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> them and spake עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבָּֽם׃ <S%H3820><s%> kindly

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> he and his father's וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> and ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim's בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> children שִׁלֵּשִׁ֑ים <S%H8029><s%> of the third גַּ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> also בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> [generation] the children מָכִיר֙ <S%H4353><s%> also of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh יֻלְּד֖וּ <S%H3205><s%> were brought up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בִּרְכֵּ֥י <S%H1290><s%> knees יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> upon Joseph's
